column1: Bulk // in bulk // the bulk of sth
column2: (noun, phrasal verb, phrasal verb) something or someone that is very large // in large amounts // most of something
(adj) changing mood or behaviour suddenly and unexpectedly
(adj) awkward because of being large, heavy, or not effective
(adj) unusual and exciting because of coming (or seeming to come) from far away, especially a tropical country
(verb) to prevent someone from doing something by making them feel nervous or embarrased // to slow down process or the growth of something
(noun) the smallest amount or number allowed or possible
(adj) very unusual or easily noticed, and therefore attracting a lot of attention
(noun) a general development or change in a situation or in the way that people are behaving
(noun) the fact that you are too interesed in your appearance or achievments
(adj) able to be easily physically, emotionally, or mentally hurt, influenced, or attacked
